titleStmt.title: The humble representation and petition of the officers of the Army, to the Parliament of the Commonwealth of England. Presented to them Wednesday the 5th of October, 1659. by Maj. General Disbrow, accompanied with the field-officers of the Army, and subscribed by above two hundred and thirty commission-officers in and about London. Together with the Parliaments answer thereunto. Wednesday, Octob. 5. 1659. Ordered by the General Council of the Officers of the Army of the Commonwealth, that this representation and petition be forthwith printed and published. Tho: Sandford, Secretary.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills dwelling in Aldersgate Street next door to the Peacock,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Aldersgate Street next door to the Peacock
